NTLM authentication is unsecure, if possible upgrade to SMB3 asap.

Since: 9.2.0

Uses the (old) SMB 1 protocol.
Only supports NTLM authentication.
See also
Github - Samba1Pipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.Samba1Pipe

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
share	text	-
The destination, aka smb://xxx/yyy share
username	text	-
The SMB share username
password	text	-
The SMB share password
authAlias	text	-
Alias used to obtain credentials for the SMB share
